        public UnoGame(UnoDeck givenDeck,
               java.util.ArrayList<UnoPlayer> givenPlayers,
               java.util.ArrayList<UnoCard> givenDispStack,
               int givenCurrentTurn,
               int givenDirection)
        UnoGame used for progressing in a game of Uno.
        Parameters:
        givenDeck - UnoDeck to be used in the game
        givenPlayers - ArrayList of UnoHands to be used in the game
        givenDispStack - ArrayList of UnoCard to be used in the game
        givenCurrentTurn - Index of the current player in the ArrayList of UnoPlayer
        givenDirection - Direction of the game
